SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.user_id, b.cdate, b.board_status, m.user_name as userName, l.lawyer_name, bf.file_path AS thumbnail_path FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN TBL_USER m ON b.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN LAWYER l ON b.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, file_path FROM board_file WHERE thumbnail = 'Y' ) bf ON b.board_no = bf.board_no
INNER JOIN categories c ON b.board_no = c.board_no AND c.category = #{category}
where 1 = 1 AND b.board_status != 'DELETE'
AND ( b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR l.LAWYER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND l.LAWYER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY b.cdate DESC OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN TBL_USER M ON B.USER_ID = M.USER_ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN LAWYER l ON b.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id WHERE 1=1 AND b.board_status != 'DELETE'
AND C.CATEGORY = #{category}
AND ( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR l.LAWYER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND l.LAWYER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.user_name AS userName, l.lawyer_name AS lawyerName, bf.file_path AS thumbnailPath FROM board b JOIN tbl_user m ON b.user_id = m.user_id LEFT JOIN lawyer l ON b.lawyer_id = l.lawyer_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, file_path FROM board_file WHERE thumbnail = 'Y' ) bf ON b.board_no = bf.board_no JOIN ( SELECT k2.board_no, COUNT(*) AS match_count FROM keyword k1 JOIN keyword k2 ON k1.keyword = k2.keyword WHERE k1.board_no = #{boardNo} AND k2.board_no != #{boardNo} GROUP BY k2.board_no HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ) match_keyword ON b.board_no = match_keyword.board_no WHERE b.board_status != 'DELETE' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM categories c1 WHERE c1.board_no = b.board_no AND c1.category = ( SELECT category FROM categories WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) ) AND ROWNUM <= 3
